title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not correctly identified.
OB: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not correctly identified.
EB: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context should be correctly identified.
SR:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Choose to create a nested class.
3. Follow the steps to create the nested class.
4. Observe that the context is not correctly identified.
